content.title: Wonderful Campaign Ending & Important Updates
content.creator:
ACEFAST
March 4, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
As our campaign officially concludes, we want to extend our heartfelt gratitude for your trust and support of the ACEFAST ACEFIT Pro. Your enthusiasm has been truly inspiring. While this campaign comes to an end, the journey of making ACEFIT Pro a reality continues!
What‚Äôs Next?
Shipping Information Collection
We will soon begin collecting your shipping details via a survey. This survey will allow you to provide your address and select your preferred color. Please check your email inbox and complete the survey within 3 days of receiving it to avoid delays.
Payment Collection
Kickstarter will begin collecting pledges 7-14 days after the campaign ends. To ensure your payment goes through smoothly, please:
Verify your credit card details.
Ensure your card is valid and has sufficient credit available.
Confirm your billing information is correct.
Contact your bank if any issues arise.
If you encounter any problems, please reach out to us at service@acefastacefitpro.com or contact Kickstarter at www.kickstarter.com/contact.
Production & Shipping Update
We are excited to announce that we are now ready to enter mass production! As promised, the first batch of ACEFIT Pro units will be shipped within March 2025.
To ensure a smooth delivery process:
Shipping Method: We will ship via express delivery.
Estimated Delivery Time: 7-15 days for global shipping.
Shipping Cost: Free worldwide shipping, including taxes and duties.
Rewards & Announcements
We will announce the winners of any campaign rewards in our next update, based on successful payment completion. Stay tuned!
Thank You!
Thank you for your trust and patience as we work to deliver the ACEFIT Pro to you. We are committed to bringing you a premium product and ensuring a seamless experience. Stay tuned for further updates as we move closer to shipping!
With love,
The ACEFAST Team

comments.text: Just done the survey ü•∂ silly me make shipping late üò≠
My pledge was already collected. From what I understand, funds to the creator are the ones that become available after 2 weeks

content.title: ACEFIT Pro Reliability Test Has Started!
content.creator:
ACEFAST
January 29, 2025
content.content:
Hi ACEFIT Pro Backers,
  Following the successful conclusion of our trial production, we have now entered the production testing stage. In the video below, we've conducted several reliability tests, including:
  Artificial Sweat Corrosion Test
Temperature and Humidity Test
Waterproof Test
Transportation Reliability Test
RF Bluetooth Connectivity and Electroacoustic Test
ACEFAST at CES
This month, ACEFAST showcased the ACEFIT Pro at CES in Las Vegas. We had the pleasure of inviting numerous visitors to try our headphones and received overwhelmingly positive feedback! Check out the video to see what they had to say about ACEFIT Pro.
  Earn 15% Cashback with Kickbooster
Our Kickbooster program is still in full swing! Refer ACEFIT Pro to a friend and earn 15% cashback for each referral. Let's do the math: if you refer ACEFIT Pro to 6 friends, you could essentially get it for free!
  Sign Up Now: https://acefit-pro-open-ear-headphones-with.kickbooster.me/boost/acefit-pro-open-ear-headphones
  Thank you for your continued support!
  Best regards,
ACEFAST Team

content.title: Enjoy 15% Cashback for Referrals + In-Depth Professional Review
content.creator:
ACEFAST
January 20, 2025
content.content:
Hi ACEFIT Pro Backers,
  We‚Äôre thrilled to announce that over 240 backers have joined our project! Your support means the world to us, and we can‚Äôt wait to bring the ACEFIT Pro to life. As mentioned in our last update, the first 200 backers will receive a stylish fanny pack as a gift. We hope you enjoy this special surprise alongside your ACEFIT Pro Headphones‚Äîit‚Äôs a small token of our appreciation for your early support!
  Refer and Get 15% Cashback
We have another fantastic perk for our early supporters: our referral program! Spread the word about ACEFIT Pro to your friends and family, and for every successful referral, you‚Äôll receive 15% cashback on your purchase. Whether it‚Äôs one friend or several, the more you refer, the more you earn! It‚Äôs a win-win situation! Don‚Äôt hesitate‚Äîsign up for Kickbooster below to start earning your cashback today.
  Must-Watch Review from TT Technology
We also invite you to check out what YouTuber TT Technology has to say about the ACEFIT Pro! In their latest video, they provide an in-depth review, showcasing each feature and demonstrating how the headphones perform in real-life scenarios. This review is a great way to see the product in action and hear expert insights!
  Thank you once again for being part of this journey with us. We‚Äôre excited to continue sharing updates and getting closer to our launch.
  Best,
ACEFAST Team

content.title: We Are Live! Join Our Giveaway & Win An ACEFIT Pro!
content.creator:
ACEFAST
January 14, 2025
content.content:
Hi ACEFIT Pro Backers,
  Thank you for supporting the ACEFIT Pro campaign! From dreams to reality, we've transformed our concept into the final ACEFIT Pro prototype. After finishing our initial draft in November 2023, we dedicated months to perfecting our design. Now, we are live on Kickstarter!
  Join Our Giveaway
To express our gratitude, we‚Äôve prepared special gifts for our supporters:
üèÜ First Prize: A free ACEFIT Pro for 1 lucky winner 
ü•à Second Prize: Buy 1 ACEFIT Pro, get 2 for 10 lucky winners 
üéÅ Third Prize: The first 200 backers receive a free fanny pack
  How To Enter
Back our campaign on Kickstarter within the first 24 hours
Comment on your favorite feature of ACEFIT Pro
Winners for the first and second prizes will be announced within 24 hours
  Trial Production Started!
We‚Äôre in trial production and will begin mass production in February. Global shipping starts in March via air transport. Check out the behind-the-scenes action of ACEFIT Pro manufacturing!
  Professional Review from Flossy Carter
Discover what YouTuber Flossy Carter has to say about the ACEFIT Pro! Known for his exceptional tech reviews, Flossy Carter offers a detailed look at our product. Watch the video now!
  Thank you again for your love and support! We‚Äôll keep you updated on the production progress.
  Best Regards,
ACEFAST Team
